title: Please pass this on to the skins team.
body:
The quality of legendary skins has been honestly amazing as of late.

Ashe
Lee Sin
Caitlin
Riven 
Yasuo

I personally don't play these champs, _(and I despise 3 of them)_ so I'm clearly not bias! 
I must commend you on the effort you guys have put in to really making skins an 'experience' rather than just some different colours/sounds. 

Im sure playing these skins feels amazing, but even just playing _against_ them _(the ones that are currently out at least)_, enhances the fun of the game. 

In general, people only really give feedback when they are unhappy, so I'm sure you don't get the full appreciation of your work.
But i wanted to just share my appreciation of the work that you guys do.

Im not looking forward to the plague of Yasuo/Riven's that is coming. 
But both of them are loved by the people who do play them, and both of them are deserving of a skin of this quality.

I think a big part of the experience comes from the voice over, and it is the many interactions and subtitles that make a skin.
So skins like Freljord Taliyah and Candy King Ivern that actually have a few voice lines added to suit the skin _(but without being legendary)_, propel the quality of the skin so much further forward than their peers, and make a nice added bonus for release skins _(especially seeming the release skin is the only skin new champions have for a long time)._
I hope that release skins in the future can continue with this trend. 

Thank you for all the work that goes into these amazing new skins of high quality, they definitely go above and beyond the base definition of 'legendary' skins.

replies.body:
As luck would have it...
The very next chest I opened. xD

https://i.gyazo.com/9c0560404388967fc202c498a6bdc246.png

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Nice, that Caitlyn splash art is so epic. I love it.

I would say it'd be the best splash art in the game to date tbh.

But others like Blood Moon Diana, Classic Orianna and are not far behind.

Yasuo doesn't deserve the legendary skin, even though I main him:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/175302463/200847413?tab=overview

But still, there are more champs that have been in the League champ pool for longer than Yas and I'd like to see them get a legendary, I mean I know that ideas come up slowly and the concepts to make the skin reality take longer, but I'd still like to see some 5 year old champs get their skins first.

While its true that there are champions more deserving of skins than Yasuo _(*cough* Yorick)_. Yas is a reasonably old champion _(must be over 4 years now)_. But he is incredibly popular, and so people do wind up facing the same skin again and again and again, and it gets really boring. especially when he only has one really good skin.

So while I do believe that other champions should have more skins, before Yasuo gets some. I wont dispute that a legendary skin for Yasuo will benefit everyone _(after the initial plague of 'Yas mains' has ended of course)_.

It will make a champion who features almost literally twice in every game, a little more bearable and fresh.

Yeah, have to agree with you on that.
But like some other people.
I'm waiting for Heartseeker Urgot.
{{champion:6}} 
Please Riot.

Not just the legendaries either (though how you forgot Elementalist Lux from that list I'll never know).

Moo Cow Alistar was bloody brilliant. Expanding the Blood Moon and Dark Star lines, the Dragon skins for Zyra and Xin - there's been so many great new skins coming out for me to send myself broke with.

I didnt include Lux, becasue she is an ultimate skin. and we _expect _ the best from that tier of skins, so when riot gives us what we expect it's not so amazing, because we expect it and it is supposed to be that good.

Meanwhile we don't expect this level of of quality from legendary skins, because in the past they have been of a lower quality. So when Riot makes legendary skins that are verging on the quality of ultimates. its really above and beyond the call of duty.

and yes Moo Cow Alistar was fantastic xD

Couldn't agree more! Mecha Zero Sion {{champion:14}} is possibly my favourite skin, and as you said, the voice over really helps bring it to life, capstoned by such a beautifully executed ultimate: screaming CHOO CHOO in his menacing voice, the fact that a train was put into LoL without feeling out of place, and seriously MASSIVE APPRECIATION to whoever did his animations, the Transformer level switch from bot to vehicle mid leap is GORGEOUS!
Now update BLOOD LORD VLAD and DEMONBLADE TRYNDAMERE they are horrible for legendary skins and not worth having

I agree with how much better skins are getting, although I wish they updated some old ones because skins like the legendary panth one don't even have particles for the most part and they're just boring and clunky to play with which sucks because the majority of champs don't have one of these incredible skins. I wish they'd update more like they did for PFE.

I actually hate that new Lee Sin skin. The particles hard to see.

Good job riot. Release a broken skin for a broken champ. Nice one.
